title: Fps lag
body: i starting to get tons of fps lag i used to be able to run league on max settings with 60-70fps now all of a sudden i dropped to 17-30fps  i tried reinstalling but it still has low fps. I even tried going to low settings and  it had even more fps lag.

replies.body: I've had the same thing happen to me, downloaded the new patch and when I started playing my games were all at 15-20 fps when typically I get a constant 60 fps on max settings. Not only that I've been getting a lot more disconnects from the server, even after looking up previous solutions and trying them.
I have the same issue, this is recently.

When your FPS starts spiking, it could be an issue with an outdated graphics driver. If this is the case, changing to low settings wouldn't help since your graphics driver still can't properly run everything. Check out our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)) for how you can check your drivers, and some other possibles fixes too.
